tweet:
Trump's decision to cut refugee admissions by nearly half is for all practical purposes a refugee ban. 

Refugees go through an extensive vetting process & bring tremendous contributions to communities across America. They should be welcomed, not vilified. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/26/us/politics/trump-refugees.html …

.@BillBrowder is a champion for human rights whose fearless advocacy helped Congress pass the pivotal Sergei Magnitsky Act in 2012 to hold Russian leaders accountable for their corruption. Proud to honor him today as he receives the #LantosPrize for his work. pic.twitter.com/szUjzzHVEx

Access to contraceptives and reproductive care improves the health of our communities and empowers women worldwide. On #WorldContraceptionDay, we pledge to fight against @POTUS’ war on #TitleX, and the #GlobalGagRule, which puts access to essential care out of reach for millions

We can’t go back to the days when insurers could deny coverage to people with preexisting conditions. Under @POTUS' "junk plans", protections for 130 million Americans are at risk. I’m joining my colleagues on a resolution to end this sabotage and #ProtectPreExistingConditions. https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1177321215511252992 …

Congress enacted the Bipartisan Budget Agreement in August. Appropriators must come together and bring forth a bill to the full Senate a soon as possible so we can avoid another unnecessary shutdown. https://www.cardin.senate.gov/newsroom/press/release/cardin-says-a-continuing-resolution-is-no-substitute-for-regular-appropriations-bills …

It's refreshing to reach the end of the fiscal year without the threat of a damaging government shutdown. However, a continuing resolution is no substitute for regular appropriations bills. pic.twitter.com/GbhRVigOq1

I'm proud that the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act passed @SenateForeign yesterday. For months, protestors have faced brutal pushback for defending Hong Kong’s autonomy. This bill sends a strong message that the U.S. stands in solidarity with them https://www.cardin.senate.gov/newsroom/press/release/cardin-rubio-menendez-risch-praise-committee-passage-of-hong-kong-human-rights-and-democracy-act- …

Eugene Scalia has spent his career undermining labor rights & putting corporate interests over retirement security, wages & safety protections for American workers. The Secretary of Labor should be committed to fighting for employees, not against them. https://twitter.com/SenateDems/status/1176935010357731331 …
Every lawmaker must set politics aside and understand that the integrity of our nation and the rule of law is at stake. No one, not even the President of the United States, is above the law.

For the sake of our nation, the House followed the only Constitutional course available by formalizing an impeachment inquiry. Without prejudging the outcome, I agree that Americans need a full understanding of whether @POTUS violated the Constitution https://sen.gov/06RZ

I'm joining my colleagues to vote to reverse @POTUS national emergency declaration. His wasteful wall is costing troops & their families the facilities & services they need to serve our country & live comfortably. 

Congress must come together to put an end to his abuse of power. https://twitter.com/SenateDems/status/1176564690228514817 …

Today is #NationalVoterRegistrationDay! Your vote is your voice. The first step to making sure it is heard in our elections nationwide is registering to vote. 

Check your registration status today, then tell your friends and family to do it too. https://www.vote.org/

Saddened to hear of the passing of Mark Plotkin this weekend. A fixture of political reporting in DC, his passion & acumen on the issues gained him the respect of his colleagues, community & the officials he interviewed over the years. My thoughts are with his family & loved ones https://twitter.com/wamu885/status/1176235971064582151 …

Asking Ukraine to dig up dirt on an opponent & using foreign aid as leverage is an abuse of power & threat to national security.

Trump says his conversation with Ukrainian officials was “appropriate” -that's not enough. Congress needs the transcript to evaluate these allegations https://twitter.com/KasieDC/status/1176084290964049922 …

Today I am @NIST with @ChrisVanHollen to tour and  celebrate the opening of a new, state-of-the-art Radiation Physics Building that will enable new medical and technological advancements and allow more accurate testing. Highly impressive - and highly important for our nation. pic.twitter.com/GNv9aNHWsA

I’m working to provide more funds for STEM programs and low-income students, and to include my Strengthening American Communities Act in the Higher Education Act reauthorization to give public servants - including educators - a debt-free pathway for an undergraduate education.

At the State level, the Kirwan Commission is making transformative recommendations toward ensuring all students have access to a high-quality education. We must match their work at the federal level & work together to guarantee equal opportunities for every Maryland student. https://twitter.com/capgaznews/status/1175907628557295616 …
For months, Haitians have made their voices heard through protests. Now, the political stalemate must be resolved to prevent further delays in upcoming parliamentary elections.

Great meeting with Haiti’s Foreign Minister @BocchitEdmond yesterday to discuss TPS, politics in Haiti, regional security, and Caribbean trade initiatives. Engaging with our neighbors in the Caribbean is key to achieving our shared priorities. pic.twitter.com/Ddh7YWIWZc

Meaningful climate action means reducing emissions, investing in renewable energy, and putting the health of our communities and environment before profits. 

The Administration is working against these priorities. Today's #ClimateStrike shows that we won't stand for it.

Young people across the nation and around the world are demanding climate action and we must listen to them. I stand with the #ClimateStrike today and pledge to continue to fight the Administration's attacks on clean air, clean water, and our environment.

I’m a proud cosponsor of the SAFE Kids Act to ban E-cigarette flavorings that blatantly target kids & teens. It took hard work over years to counter dangerous tobacco marketing & reduce youth smoking. We can’t let E-cigarette companies get kids hooked. https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2019/09/19/vaping-related-illnesses-surge-fda-announces-criminal-probe/ …

The mission of the @EPA is “to protect human health and the environment." Rolling back states’ rights to set reasonable auto emission standards counters this mission. 

People and public health must come before profits. https://www.cardin.senate.gov/newsroom/press/release/cardin-trump-auto-emission-rollback …

Our constitution guarantees a right to representation for all of our citizens, to deny that for the 700k tax-paying residents of D.C. is an injustice. 

Voting rights are human rights, we must set the example here at home. I'm proud to support the fight for #DCStatehood https://twitter.com/MayorBowser/status/1172846709178798081 …

The American people want action, not an endless cycle of violence and thoughts and prayers. The Senate can start by expanding universal background checks. @SenateDems are calling on @senatemajldr to do the right thing and let us vote to #EndGunVIolence. pic.twitter.com/kV5nyMpjQ0

Cokie Roberts was as legendary on the Hill as she was in the newsroom. She set the standard for thorough political reporting & broke barriers for women in journalism. I’m privileged to have met her & to have had her as a constituent. She will be deeply missed. https://twitter.com/ABC/status/1173966610048139265 …

#ConstitutionDay is a great time to highlight the goal of the census as established by our governing document: to count all people living in the US. As #2020Census quickly approaches, we must ensure full funding for the Census Bureau to fulfill this duty https://bit.ly/2kmtkFf

The Constitution laid the groundwork for our democratic institution, freedoms & rule of law. This document is as strong as those who pledge to uphold it. We must always stay true to its governance & the enduring project to create a more perfect union for all. #ConstitutionDay

Congress has never given the president authorization to use military force against Iran. We want to use diplomacy, not our military, to resolve this issue.

Watch my full interview here:  https://on.msnbc.com/2kPjY4V  https://twitter.com/MeetThePress/status/1173725516152680448 …

Universal background checks should be a no-brainer. It’s been over 200 days since the House passed the bill to expand background checks.  @SenateMajLdr, we don't have time to wait on this. We must vote now.

-100 people a day die from gun violence. 
-Guns are among the leading causes of death for children and teens. 
-58% of Americans know someone or have themselves experienced gun violence.

This is a national public health crisis.

Direct Support Professionals provide home & community services to help many seniors, and people with disabilities & chronic illnesses live active fulfilling lives. 

I'm proud to end DSP Recognition Week with a resolution to honor their work.  #DSPRW19 https://www.cardin.senate.gov/newsroom/press/release/cardin-collins-applaud-the-passage-of-resolution-to-recognize-direct-support-professionals-in-health-care …

The child development center at Joint Base Andrews needs critical structural repair to provide safe care for the growing number of kids on base. I saw it first-hand today. 

@POTUS is taking money from this project for his wall. This is not how we honor those serving our country. pic.twitter.com/q2KAskCjJK

Clean, safe water is a right of every person in this country. 

By gutting the #CleanWaterRule @POTUS and @EPAWheeler have put that right, and the health of our communities and environment at risk. 
#ProtectCleanWater https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/12/climate/trump-administration-rolls-back-clean-water-protections.html …

I authored the Elie Wiesel Genocide & Atrocities Prevention Act to advance US leadership in preventing human rights abuses. Pleased to see the release of the first report under the law. The admin. must follow through with our duty to the global community.
 https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/ELIE-WIESEL-GENOCIDE-AND-ATROCITIES-PREVENTION-REPORT.pdf …

Every member of Congress should be concerned about @POTUS' abuse of power and willingness to undermine the men and women who serve our country to build his wasteful wall.

We must stand up in opposition of this power grab and defend our military families. https://twitter.com/SenateDems/status/1172240977144274944 …

53 people were killed in mass shootings in August alone. 
We can end this tragic cycle of violence if we come together to pass gun safety legislation.

My colleagues & I are live on the floor calling for @Senatemajldr to do the right thing and let us vote:  https://www.c-span.org/video/?464192-1/senate-session …

Mr. Bolton and I disagreed on most issues. He was hawkish but a straight shooter. The @POTUS' turbulent foreign policy, which has shredded American diplomacy and global leadership, will now continue to be rudderless as he takes counsel from no one but himself. https://twitter.com/politico/status/1171652349636616192 …

For the legacy of those who perished, for the first responders who still live with wounds from the day, for the survivors & generations yet to come, we must pledge to define this day by our unity & to continue our fight for a more perfect union. https://www.cardin.senate.gov/newsroom/press/release/cardin-statement-on-the-anniversary-of-9/09/11/2019/11 …

18 years ago our nation was changed forever. 

On the anniversary of the #September11 attacks, we honor the 3,000 Americans, including 400 brave first responders, we lost on that day. #NeverForget pic.twitter.com/TF1TNQlk1a

I'll be joining my colleagues to vote to end @POTUS' national emergency declaration. We cannot stand by while he takes funds from military projects and the troops and families they benefit to build his unnecessary border wall. https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/senate-democrats-to-force-one-more-vote-against-trumps-border-emergency-declaration/2019/09/09/dde07b66-d378-11e9-9610-fb56c5522e1c_story.html …

Renewing the call to reinstate the free flow of communications and especially much needed medical supplies within Kashmir. Democracies have a responsibility to uphold the human and civil rights of all peoples. https://www.cardin.senate.gov/newsroom/press/release/cardin-statement-jammu-and-kashmir …

My Baltimore office will be closed early today due to evacuations in the Inner Harbor following the discovery of a suspicious vehicle. Anyone in need of constituent services should reach out to the DC office at 202-224-4524 or  https://cardin.senate.gov . https://www.baltimoresun.com/maryland/baltimore-city/bs-md-ci-building-evacuated-20190909-tsjjax7jw5fjtmk35pnajgvh5m-story.html …

Yet another poll confirms that a majority of Americans want common-sense gun safety laws. 

Across party lines, 89% support universal background checks and 86% are in favor of red flag laws. @SenateMajLdr, we can't wait any longer to answer their calls. https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/americans-of-both-parties-overwhelmingly-support-red-flag-laws-expanded-gun-background-checks-washington-post-abc-news-poll-finds/2019/09/08/97208916-ca75-11e9-a4f3-c081a126de70_story.html …

The worsening effects of the climate crisis hit low-income communities the hardest. Addressing climate change is not just about preserving our environment, it's about social & economic justice as well. It's long past time for the Senate to take action. https://www.npr.org/2019/09/03/754044732/as-rising-heat-bakes-u-s-cities-the-poor-often-feel-it-most …

2 years ago, Trump ended #DACA, threatening the legal status for over 800,000 DREAMers working in our communities, contributing to our economy, raising families, & going back to school this fall. 

The House has passed a bill to #ProtectTheDream, it's time for the Senate to act.

Finding affordable child care can be challenging for military families. Congress directed funds for a long-sought project to upgrade the child development center on Joint Base Andrews. @POTUS wants to take that money to build his unnecessary border wall. https://cbsloc.al/2HM5U4m

Today I am joining #FCC Commisioner @GeoffreyStarks, @DavidTrone and @ChrisVanHollen in Hagerstown to underscore the importance of broadband access to rural communities. Overcoming the barriers to connecting the last mile is of critical importance to Maryland's local economies. pic.twitter.com/1AoOPVtfjn

"Hate must have no harbor in Baltimore if we are going to build this city into the one we know that it can be." -- with U.S. Representative Elijah Cummings, Rabbi Mitchell Wohlberg and Reverend Dr. Terris King, the Senior Pastor at Liberty Grace Church of God. #Interfaith #Unity pic.twitter.com/UDCGGrVP8P

Withdrawing the extradition bill is the right thing to do, but it’s only the first step toward meeting the demands of the protesters. The Chinese government must be held accountable for its actions, and respect Hong Kong’s autonomy and its citizens’ democratic freedoms. https://twitter.com/cnni/status/1169189454118039552 …

Today I joined Commodore John Rogers Elementary principal Marc Martin to welcome back students and learn more about the innovative @TheLiteracyLab program @AmeriCorps members are implementing to improve success for #Baltimore students. Great commitment. Greater outcomes. pic.twitter.com/SDSijcXs7Q – at Commodore John Rogers Elementary & Middle School

Unions led the fight for worker rights, fair wages, & benefits during the labor movement. Today, their rights to mobilize & collectively bargain are under attack. On #LaborDay, let's commit to standing with them as they continue to be the voice & power for American workers.
